summary: This bill, the "Protecting Air Ambulance Services for Americans Act of 2025," aims to revise Medicare payments for air ambulance services. It authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services to update the fee schedule using existing and newly collected data on costs and utilization. The bill mandates the Secretary to finalize data collection rules, and instructs the Comptroller General to conduct a study on air ambulance costs and payments, providing recommendations for improving the fee schedule.
